name: Valhalla Arena
description:
As a Berserker, you'll need to fight for your survival and to win a sit next to Odin in this game set in Valhalla.
In this game, the battle system is rythmic and synchronized with the breathing of your warrior, meaning each time he reaches the sweat spot in his breathing cycle you'll have the opportunity to perform a perfect blow which will greatly increase your damage. Thanks to your battle spirit, you'll be able to build up rage each time you perform a perfect blow. When the rage gauge is full, release the power of the bear and destroy the opponents' will ! When an ennemy is in fear and you kill them, you'll regain life points. Don't forget to keep an eye on the dagger at the top right of the screen to find your next victims.

Music by Anton Shilo :  https://www.youtube.com/c/AntonShilo/featured
